sentences.sContent: A second evaluation at the end of this period determines the length of time a detainee must spend in community rehabilitation.
sentences.sContent_eng: A second evaluation at the end of this period determines the length of time a detainee must spend in community rehabilitation.
sentences.sCn: 这一时期结束时的第二次评估被用来确定被拘留者必须花多少时间进行社区康复。

sentences.sContent: Third, you and the organization have the responsibility under most state laws of finding avenues for an employee’s rehabilitation.
sentences.sContent_eng: Third, you and the organization have the responsibility under most state laws of finding avenues for an employee’s rehabilitation.
sentences.sCn: 第三，按照大多数州立法，你和你的单位是有责任为雇员的康复寻找一个很好的途径。

sentences.sContent: They also benefit less from prevention efforts, and have less access to high-quality treatment and rehabilitation services.
sentences.sContent_eng: They also benefit less from prevention efforts, and have less access to high-quality treatment and rehabilitation services.
sentences.sCn: 他们也较少能受益于预防工作，而且较少能获取高质量的治疗和康复服务。

phrases.pCn: 职业康复；职业复健；职业更新；职业复原辅导

words.tran: 复兴；复权；恢复正常生活
使康复；使恢复名誉；使恢复原状
